misc: The phenomenon called 'Okkotoberfest' was named after his alcohol-induced condition in a past Hector event
biography: Okko, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is known for his unwavering dedication and, occasionally, his susceptibility to festive spirits. Representing Hirsala Golf, Okko has been a consistent presence in the tournament, showcasing a blend of skill and, shall we say, a unique approach to post-round celebrations.

While his back has troubled him in the past, Okko's determination remains unyielding. His participation in the Hector Trophée is always marked by memorable moments, both on and off the course. In fact, the infamous phenomenon known as 'Okkotoberfest' was named in his honor, commemorating his alcohol-induced condition at a past Hector event.

With one Hector Trophée victory under his belt, Okko will be seeking further glory in the upcoming tournament. Despite not yet claiming the Victor Trophy, his competitive spirit and camaraderie make him a beloved figure among participants and spectators alike. This year marks Okko's fifth appearance, and anticipation is building to see what memorable moments he will bring to the greens.
